name: getyourluck-monorepo

scripts.build: cd comprehensive-testing-platform/frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && cp -r comprehensive-testing-platform/frontend/dist ./dist && cp -r comprehensive-testing-platform/frontend/public/_routes.json ./dist/_routes.json 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r comprehensive-testing-platform/frontend/public/_redirects ./dist/_redirects 2>/dev/null || true

description: Monorepo for GetYourLuck comprehensive testing platform
